dialogue.speaker: Lord Arin
dialogue.text: Welcome, brave adventurer, to the land of Eridoria. I am Lord Arin, ruler of this realm.

dialogue.speaker: Adventurer (you)
dialogue.text: Greetings, Lord Arin. I've come seeking fortune and glory in these lands.

dialogue.speaker: Lord Arin
dialogue.text: A bold spirit, I like that! But be warned, our lands are fraught with danger. Dark forces stir in the shadows.

dialogue.speaker: Adventurer (you)
dialogue.text: I'm not afraid of a challenge. Tell me, what's the nature of this darkness that threatens your lands?
